subject: [Good] Amazon does not sell your data
text:
"Information about our customers is an important part of our business, and we are not in the business of selling it to others"
https://github.com/tosdr/tosback2/blob/master/crawl/amazon.com/Amazon.com%20Privacy%20Notice.txt#L60

after a few negative points, it's great to find this positive one, more services should make that pledge in their privacy policies. we should give them good positive points for this.
